          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A hőmérséklet járása</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Changes Of Temperature</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Temperaturänderungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Variations Température</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As Mudanças De Temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le Variazioni Di Temperatura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αλλαγές της θερμοκρασίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Cambios De la Temperatura</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A hőmérséklet napi és évi járása, izotermatérkép, napfénytartam, hőösszeg.</string>
            <string language="en-US">Daily and Annual Change of Temperature, Isothermal Map, Sunshine Duration, Accumulated Quality of Radiation</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">légkör</string>
            <string language="en-US">atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">izoterma</string>
            <string language="en-US">isotherm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hajlásszög</string>
            <string language="en-US">inclination angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">hőösszeg</string>
            <string language="en-US">accumulated quality of radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tägliche und jährliche Temperaturänderung, 
Isothermalkarte, Sonnenschein-Dauer, akkumulierte Qualität der 
Strahlung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Variation température quotidienne et annuelle, 
carte isotherme, durée de soleil, qualité accumulée de rayonnement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudança de temperatura diária e anual, mapa 
isothermal, duração da luz do sol, qualidade acumulada da 
radiação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Variazione di temperatura quotidiana ed annuale, 
programma isotermico, durata del sole, qualità accumulata di 
radiazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθημερινή και ετήσια αλλαγή της θερμοκρασίας, 
ισόθερμος χάρτης, "διάρκεια" ηλιοφάνειας, συσσωρευμένη ποιότητα 
της ακτινοβολίας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambio diario y anual de la temperatura, 
correspondencia isotérmica, duración de la sol, calidad acumulada de
la radiación</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Isotherme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Neigungwinkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">akkumulierte Qualität der Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'atmosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">isotherme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle de inclination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualité accumulée de rayonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atmosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">isotherm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da inclinação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
